meanings.definition: A small hill in Southern Africa.
meanings.sent1: The lion rested on top of the kopje.
meanings.sent2: We hiked up the kopje to get a better view of the savanna.
meanings.sent3: The elephants used the kopje as a lookout point for predators.
meanings.sent4: The kopje stood like a tiny island in the sea of grass.
meanings.sent5: The kopje's rocky surface shimmered in the setting sun.

meanings.definition: A small hill or mound of earth.
meanings.sent1: The children rolled down the grassy kopje.
meanings.sent2: She planted flowers on top of the small kopje in her garden.
meanings.sent3: The ants built their nest under the kopje, hidden from view.
meanings.sent4: The kopje in the backyard was a miniature version of a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The kopje's soil was rich and perfect for growing vegetables.
